vote.title: A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application by LDG The Heights at UNT Station, LP, an affiliate of LDG Development (Applicant) to the Texas Department of Housing and Community Affairs (TDHCA) for 4% Non-Competitive Low-Income Housing Tax Credits (4% Housing Tax Credits) for The Heights at UNT Station, located at 1021 East Wheatland Road, Dallas, Texas 75241 (Property); and, at the close of the public hearing, authorize a Resolution of No Objection for Applicant, related to its application to TDHCA for the development of The Legacy on Belt Line - Financing: No cost consideration to the City
